title: Low FPS and Graphics On MacOSX Sierra Software Update
body: Alongside many others, i have witnessed an almost 50% drop in fps when updating my mac to the OSX sierra 10.13. This is making the game extraordinarily difficult to play, and this has been a year long forums issue. Please look into this riot games :)

replies.body: This has persisted for over a year on Sierra and High Sierra. It doesn't look like it's going to be fixed anytime soon as the patches go by. Time to ditch Direct X, support Metal 2, and optimize for all OS's.

I haven't heard any specific fps issues with Sierra, but there might be some settings getting in the way.  Check out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide under the Mac specific section, and let me know if those steps help tune things up a bit.
